txt.en: Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.\n\nYour mission is to defeat Orcs in the Dimrill Dale and plant banners of the Gabil'akkâ upon them.
Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath at Akrâz-zahar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'Our scouts have sighted a greater number of Orcs patrolling beyond the East-gate and down into the Dimrill Dale. We fight this day for Gundabad, but the time will soon come to return to Khazad-dûm and drive every last Orc from its halls! That is the promise of the Kharum-ubnâr!

'You are to travel to the Dimrill Dale at once and plant our banners upon every Orc you slay!'
Monsters in this mission will enrage at low morale, gaining attack strength and attack speed.
Your mission is to defeat Orcs in the Dimrill Dale and plant banners of the Gabil'akkâ upon them.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath and travel to the Dimrill Dale.
'Well done, [placeholder]!\n\n'There is only one sort of message an Orc will understand, and you have delivered it!'
